title: Chat gbt thank you
text: I just want to say how much I love this app and how much it has improved my life every single day. It has made things so much easier for me, whether it‚Äôs helping me write better, express my thoughts clearly, or just organize my ideas. I‚Äôm not the type of person who spends money on apps‚ÄîI‚Äôm actually really cheap when it comes to that. But let me tell you, I spent money on this app, and that should say everything! If an app can get someone like me to actually pay for it, then you know they‚Äôre doing something right. This is top-level quality, hands down. If I had to choose one app to spend my money on, it would be this one without a doubt. It‚Äôs that good. As I‚Äôm writing this, I‚Äôm literally using the app itself to help me put my words together, and that just proves how much of a game-changer it is. Highly recommend it to anyone who wants to improve their communication, writing, or just make life easier!

title: Great service, but needs an option for expanded memory!
text: I love using ChatGPT and rely on it for ongoing support, especially for complex health issues and long-term context. However, the memory limit is a huge problem for users like me who need continuity. Having to delete important details just to keep using the service is frustrating. I would gladly pay $50/month for expanded memory if OpenAI offered it. Many users with chronic conditions, ongoing projects, or business needs would benefit from a higher-tier plan with more memory storage. Please consider this option for power users

title: Recent update has caused MAJOR ISSUES.
text: I use this app daily for entertainment purposes/ fleshing out my ideas for dnd with better vocabulary and dialogue. Because this app is one of the better chat bots and has the read aloud feature I love the app, I even opted for the upgrade(I don‚Äôt pay for something that I can otherwise get for free.) I love the service, and for many months this has been the perfect solution for me. This most recent update where the menu is displayed at the bottom rather than the press and hold, has caused issues that make the app much harder to enjoy. I only pay for this app for the ‚Äúread aloud‚Äù feature due to my hands needing to be free for work, and the convenience that it provides. For a service I pay for, the ‚Äúread aloud‚Äù bug has me ready to walk away. Please fix this, I will be forced to look to another chat service if this feature isn‚Äôt restored.

title: Wait time solution
text: Hi! As much as I love to use this app, it can be annoying when there‚Äôs a picture (specifically one user didn‚Äôt send) that makes it so there‚Äôs a really long wait until you can continue the chat! So I was thinking of a possible solution. Maybe you could add some sort of mini game that lowers the wait time by 10-20 minutes (the amount of time reduced per play is completely up to you). Depending on the mini game, it would also be a good way for users to take a break from the stress of life. This is only a suggestion. But if someone sees this, please consider it! Have a good day/night!
